text: Villa Gordiani is a park in Rome. Several Roman ruins, some of them still well preserved, are in the park. == Photos == File:Villa Gordiani - Park of Rome a.jpg|The "Mausoleum" of Villa Gordiani, the best preserved monument of the park. File:Villa Gordiani c.jpg|Panorama of the park File:Villa Gordiani b.jpg|The "Torrione" (the big tower), an imposing Roman ruin File:A child running.jpg|A child running in the park File:Villa Gordiani.JPG|A corner of the park Category:Parks in Europe Category:Rome
title: Villa Gordiani
